Package craterdog.utils

Class ByteUtils

java.lang.Object
craterdog.utils.ByteUtils
public final class ByteUtils extends Object
This utility class defines functions that manipulate bytes and byte arrays in useful ways.
Author:
Derk Norton

      public static int booleanToBytes(boolean b, byte[] buffer)
      This function converts a boolean into its corresponding byte format and inserts it into the specified buffer.
      Parameters:
      b - The boolean to be converted.
      buffer - The byte array.
      Returns:
      The number of bytes inserted.

      Parameters:
      b - The boolean to be converted.
      buffer - The byte array.
      index - The index in the array to begin inserting bytes.
      Returns:
      The number of bytes inserted.

      Parameters:

      index - The index for the first byte in the byte array.

      Returns:
      The corresponding string value.

    • equals

      public static boolean equals(byte[] first, byte[] second)
      This function compares two byte arrays to see if they are equal.
      Parameters:
      first - The first byte array.
      second - The second byte array.
      Returns:
      Whether or not the two byte arrays are equal.

    • compare

      public static int compare(byte[] first, byte[] second)
      This function compares two byte arrays for canonical ordering.
      Parameters:
      first - The first byte array.
      second - The second byte array.
      Returns:
      The signum result of the comparison.
